players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso — I investigated them last night."
Charlie: "That's a bold claim, Diana — why would you accuse me so quickly?"

You: "I don't trust Diana's quick certainty. Who did she investigate and how? We know one detective exists — if Diana is telling the truth she should explain her process. Charlie, where were you last night?"

Charlie: "I was at home all night — I had no chance to do anything. Diana, your claim is serious: can you share exactly what you investigated and when? If you're the detective, explain your method so we can verify."

You: "Both Diana and Charlie claims can't both be trusted yet. Diana, you said you investigated Charlie — what result did you get exactly (role name)? Charlie, your alibi is weak without details. I lean to voting Diana if she can't clarify."

Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and my read was 'Mafioso.' I understand skepticism, but there's only one detective and my investigation was during the night phase before Bob was found dead. If you arrest me instead of Charlie, the mafia will remain and likely kill again tonight. Vote Charlie — we need to stop the mafia now."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
